short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionize your online content management with our new feature: Chat with your saved content using the incredible capabilitiesâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revolutionize your online content management with our new feature: Chat with your saved content using the incredible capabilities of GPT! Here you can save, organize, and generate reports for your online content in just one click. 

With just one click, you can save the links as well as the corresponding article content directly to your selected folder. No more wasting time searching for that interesting article you saw earlier - it's all organized for you.

And it doesn't stop there. We've made it simple for you to jot down your thoughts and ideas. And if you need to capture a pic, our screenshot function has got you covered.

All your collected information is neatly organized by folder and tagged for easy retrieval. And with our generate folder report button, you can effortlessly generate an up-to-date report that combines all your saved links, captured content, and notes for that specific folder.
